reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 638/00: DESIGNATION OF SERVICE MANAGERS AND SPECIFICATION OF GEOGRAPHIC AREAS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION OF SERVICE MANAGERS AND SPECIFICATION OF GEOGRAPHIC AREAS

content.content: 2. For the purposes of subsection 4 (1) of the Act, the municipalities and district social services administration boards set out in Column 2 of the Schedule are designated as service managers. O. Reg. 638/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of subsection 4 (1) of the Act, the municipalities and district social services administration boards set out in Column 2 of the Schedule are designated as service managers. O. Reg. 638/00, s. 2.

content.content:
3. For the purposes of subsection 4 (2) of the Act, the geographic area that is the service area of a service manager set out in Column 2 of the Schedule is the territory, as constituted from time to time, of the municipality or district social services administration board set out in Column 1 of the Schedule opposite to that service manager. O. Reg. 638/00, s. 3. SCHEDULE 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 365/01, s. 2. SCHEDULE  Item

3. For the purposes of subsection 4 (2) of the Act, the geographic area that is the service area of a service manager set out in Column 2 of the Schedule is the territory, as constituted from time to time, of the municipality or district social services administration board set out in Column 1 of the Schedule opposite to that service manager. O. Reg. 638/00, s. 3.
